data.title: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
data.content:
**Background**: In recent years, there has been a growing trend towards digitization among businesses in the Nordic countries as well as many other parts of the world. This is due to several factors, including the increasing availability of technology, a growing demand for online services, and the need to improve efficiency and productivity. Basically, strategic digitalization has become a central part of most businesses.

However, digitization can be a costly investment, especially for small and medium-sized businesses as it often requires the hiring of highly skilled IT professionals, which can be very expensive.

Outsourcing gives businesses the freedom to scale their resources up and down as needed, without having to hire and fire employees.

**Research**: Recent studies have found that cost is still the number two highest concern of CIOs in the Nordics, when looking for any kind of outsourcing. The studies also found that 86% of the interviewed companies already outsourcing Finance and Accounting say that the key driver was cost reduction.

But what about when it comes to strategic “one of a kind” differentiating digital products? How do companies ensure controlled and cost-effective outsourcing of these kinds of digital solutions?

**Solution**: One way to solve the problem of high outsourcing costs is to find an offshore partner. Offshore partners are typically based in countries with lower labor costs, which can significantly reduce the overall cost of outsourcing. However, it is important to note that not all offshore partners are created equal. Some offshore partners may offer lower prices, but they may also have lower quality standards. It is important to carefully vet any potential offshore partner before deciding. This way a competitive cost advantage and the quality, a strategic digital product requires to propel your business, may be harvested.
